titles.title: A bill to amend section 365 of title 11, United States Code, relating to unexpired leases of personal property in chapter 11 cases.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2643)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

bill.summary: 3/10/1993--Introduced. Amends Federal bankruptcy law to require a trustee in bankruptcy in a chapter 11 case to timely perform all obligations of the debtor on unexpired leases for personal property (including leases for equipment) during the period between the filing of a bankruptcy petition and the time the executory contract or lease is assumed or rejected.
